Projects.name: Tetris_Game
Projects.description: A modern Tetris game implemented using the MERN stack with a microservices architecture. Features responsive design, dynamic gameplay, and scalable backend services.
Projects.Tech: MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, Microservices, Netlify

Projects.name: XO Game V1
Projects.description: A clean and interactive Tic-Tac-Toe game featuring simple logic and smooth UI animations, playable in the browser.

Projects.name: To-Do List
Projects.description: A minimalist to-do list app built with React that allows users to add, mark, and remove tasks with ease. Fully responsive design.

Projects.name: Simple Calculator
Projects.description: A basic yet functional web calculator supporting arithmetic operations, designed with clean UI and responsive layout.
